item.title: 嶺東科大-FinTech-第2堂課
item.description: 第1步：獲取R工作目錄指令 getwd() ## [1] "/Users/StevenYang/Desktop/RBlog/lyang201801/try/content/post" 第2步：R使用quantmod套件指令 ## Loading required package: xts ## Loading required package: zoo ## ## Attaching package: 'zoo' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## as.Date, as.Date.numeric ## Loading required package: TTR ## Version 0.4-0 included new data defaults. See ?getSymbols. 第3步：R網路抓取Yahoo中大立光股王股價資料 options(getSymbols.auto.assign=F) d=getSymbols("3008.TW") # 以大力光為例 ## 'getSymbols' currently uses auto.assign=TRUE by default, but will ## use auto.assign=FALSE in 0.5-0. You will still be able to use ## 'loadSymbols' to automatically load data.

item.title: 嶺東科大-FinTech-第1堂課
item.description: library(rvest) title: “嶺東科大-FinTech-第1堂課” author: ‘楊永列’ date: ‘2018-03-15’ output: html_document: theme: united toc: yes pdf_document: highlight: zenburn toc: yes word_document: toc: yes subtitle: 利用R語言-劃AAPL股價k線及技術指標 institute: 嶺東科技大學財經學院(台灣台中) — 第1步：R工作目錄指令 getwd() ## [1] "/Users/StevenYang/Desktop/RBlog/lyang201801/try/content/post" 第2步：R使用quantmod套件指令 ## Loading required package: xts ## Loading required package: zoo ## ## Attaching package: 'zoo' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## as.Date, as.Date.numeric ## Loading required package: TTR ## Version 0.4-0 included new data defaults.

item.title: Yang Yung-Lieh
item.description: Professor Yang graduated from DongWu University economic department, the Ling Tung University Vice President, Dean of College of Finance and economics, Executive Master of business (EMBA) Professor, engaged in banking, financial risk, investment portfolio, performance evaluation, economic research and teaching. Professeur Yang est diplômé du département du commerce de l’Université de DongWu, actuellement en fonction de vice-président de l’Université Ling Tung, Doyen du Collège de Finance et d’Économie, Professeur de Master Exécutif (EMBA), est depuis longtemps engagé dans le secteur bancaire, risque financier, portefeuille d’investissement, évaluation de la performance, recherche économique et enseignement.
